entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 06:29 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy and 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
